🚀 Maastricht University | 📍Maastricht, Netherlands | 🗓️ 1 September 2018 - 31 August 2023

As a seasoned professional in the field of customer insights and market intelligence, I have a proven track record of delivering tangible results in the digital age. My expertise lies in identifying and prioritizing critical business decisions through the use of data-driven insights and market intelligence tools.

With a keen eye for detail and a commitment to digitalization and innovation, I specialize in implementing cutting-edge market intelligence tools such as CDP, Mailing, and CRM to support marketing and communication officers in delivering successful projects.

As a skilled change management and project management professional, I have the ability to ensure successful implementation of marketing research projects through the application of analytical skills and business intelligence.

My expertise in data management and performance measurement allows me to effectively measure and track the success of marketing campaigns, providing valuable insights to drive business improvement. I am also proficient in using industry-standard analytics tools such as Power BI, Tableau, Google Data Studio and Google Analytics.

With a passion for business process improvement, I am committed to helping companies achieve their full potential by leveraging my skills and experience to make informed decisions through data-driven insights.

profile_positions.description:
🚀 Mercedes-Benz NV | 📍Maastricht, Netherlands | 🗓️ 1 September 2017 - 31 August 2018

As a highly experienced consultant specializing in continuous process improvement for after-sales support entities, I have a proven track record of delivering exceptional results. My expertise lies in integrating software and processes to create strategic projects and initiatives that optimize process execution and provide effective solutions.

With a strong commitment to digitalization and innovation, I have the ability to assess the impact of changes within the core business process environment and define business-related data requirements to ensure successful implementation. I set up and implement process KPIs and targets, coordinate the management and implementation of operational templates, and enable operations to effectively implement new business processes and changes.

As a skilled change management professional, I measure, monitor, and analyze the effectiveness of core business processes and identify opportunities for improvement. I am proficient in using analytics and performance measurement tools to drive continuous process improvement and achieve operational excellence.

I am dedicated to adhering to Mercedes-Benz standard project management methodology and PMO principles, and have a proven ability to manage successful implementation of area-specific projects and initiatives.

Overall, I bring a wealth of expertise in continuous process improvement, analytics, and performance measurement to the table, and am committed to delivering outstanding results that drive business success.
profile_positions.title: Senior Business Process Consultant

profile_positions.description:
🚀 Mercedes-Benz NV | 📍Maastricht, Netherlands | 🗓️ 1 June 2015 - 31 August 2017

As a Business Process Consultant, I specialize in driving business process simplification, standardization, and innovation to deliver optimal results for organizations. My expertise lies in seamlessly integrating software and processes to provide effective solutions and optimize process execution.

With a passion for digitalization and innovation, I create and implement strategic projects and initiatives that help organizations achieve their goals. My ability to assess the impact of changes within the core business process environment, define business-related data requirements, and set up process KPIs and targets enables me to optimize operational templates and drive effective implementation of new business processes and changes.

I am committed to maintaining ISO 9001 quality standards and ensuring the successful implementation of area-specific projects and initiatives. I also have extensive experience analyzing and implementing CRM system demands and change requests, while adhering to the ruling IT procedures to optimize process execution.

By measuring, monitoring, and analyzing the effectiveness of core business processes, I identify opportunities for improvement and drive continuous improvement initiatives. My skills and experience make me a valuable asset to any organization seeking to optimize their business processes, improve efficiency, and drive growth.
profile_positions.title: Business Process Consultant

profile_positions.company: Mercedes-Benz Customer Assistance Center Maastricht NV
profile_positions.description:
🚀 Mercedes-Benz NV | 📍Maastricht, Netherlands | 🗓️ 1 August 2012 - 30 May 2015

As a team member of the Roadside Assistance and Logistics 24/7 Service for Mercedes-Benz, my primary responsibility is to provide timely and efficient support to customers who encounter issues with their vehicles. I work closely with a team of skilled professionals to deliver exceptional service that meets the highest standards of quality and professionalism.

My tasks involve receiving customer calls and promptly responding to their inquiries, as well as providing accurate and comprehensive information regarding available services, pricing, and other related details. I also utilize various digital tools and systems to track and manage customer requests, and ensure that all service requests are promptly dispatched to the appropriate personnel.

In addition, I collaborate with the logistics team to coordinate the transportation of vehicles to the nearest authorized Mercedes-Benz service center for repairs or maintenance. I ensure that all necessary paperwork and documentation are completed in accordance with established procedures, and that customers are kept informed of the status of their vehicles at all times.

Moreover, I conduct regular follow-ups with customers to ensure that their needs are being met and that they are satisfied with the service provided. I maintain a high level of professionalism and customer service throughout all interactions with customers, and strive to exceed their expectations in every way possible.

Overall, my role in the Roadside Assistance and Logistics 24/7 Service for Mercedes-Benz is crucial in providing customers with a seamless and stress-free experience, ensuring that they receive the highest quality of service at all times.
profile_positions.title: CSR Roadside Assistance

profile_positions.description: I am the co-founder of a young pizzeria with a traditional Italian wood-fired oven, specializing in Neapolitan-style pizzas. I have a passion for bringing authentic Italian flavors to the table and I am committed to creating delicious, high-quality pizza with the best ingredients. My commitment to excellence has enabled me to create a unique and inviting atmosphere for all my customers. I am constantly innovating and integrating new recipes to stay competitive in the industry. My passion for creating delicious pizzas has enabled me to build a loyal following and establish a strong reputation in the local community.
profile_positions.title: Co-Founder

profile_positions.description:
I am a volunteer in the Italian Civil Protection, a humanitarian organisation dedicated to saving lives and providing relief to communities in need. I am passionate about helping others and making a positive impact in my community. I am a tenacious and dedicated volunteer, committed to protecting and assisting people in disaster-affected areas. I have been actively involved in disaster relief operations, providing assistance to victims, working in emergency response teams, and organising humanitarian aid. My commitment to helping those in need has enabled me to gain invaluable experience and knowledge in the field of humanitarian aid.

Experience in drills of natural disaster operation and fire protection. Involved as volunteer in emergency medical aid, as stretcher-bearer. Obtained Basic Life Support qualification (BHV) with annual updates.
profile_positions.title: Volunteer
